PANewsAWARD2020.sol.content:
// File: contracts/PANewsAWARD2020.sol

// SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT
pragma solidity ^0.6.0;

contract PANewsAWARD2020 {
string public PANews_award_2020 = 
"“PARTY AWARD 2020” PANews‘ Annual Data Awards Ceremony List Announced"

"Public Chains Awards"
"Congratulations to “Cocos-BCX“ 、“GXChain“ 、“WAX“ 、“Matic Network“、 “Nervos“ for wining the “Most Dynamic Public Chains Award” in the category of “Public Chains” at PANews’ Retrospect of the Year Award 2020, a.k.a. PARTY Award 2020!  "

"Congratulations to “Qtum“ 、“Conflux“  、“QuarkChain“ 、“IoTeX“ 、 “Avalanche“  、“Tokamak Network“ for wining the “Best Technological Innovation Award” in the category of “Public Chains” at PANews’ Retrospect of the Year Award 2020, a.k.a. PARTY Award 2020! "

"Congratulations to “TRON“、“BSC“、“HPB“、“Ontology“、“Heco“ for wining the “Best Popularity Award” in the category of “Public Chains” at PANews’ Retrospect of the Year Award 2020, a.k.a. PARTY Award 2020!"

"Exchanges Awards"
"Congratulations to “HBTC” 、“AAX”、“Poloniex” 、“Bibox” 、 “CoinEx” 、 “Hoo” 、“OceanEx” for wining the “Best Safety Award” in the category of “Exchanges” at PANews’ Retrospect of the Year Award 2020, a.k.a. PARTY Award 2020!"

"Congratulations to “MXC” 、 “BKEX Global” 、 “Gate.io” 、 “FTX” for wining the “Best Product Innovation Award” in the category of “Exchanges” at PANews’ Retrospect of the Year Award 2020, a.k.a. PARTY Award 2020!"

"Congratulations to “OKEx” 、“Binance” 、“Coinbase” 、“Huobi Global” for wining the “Best Trading Depth Award” in the category of “Exchanges” at PANews’ Retrospect of the Year Award 2020, a.k.a. PARTY Award 2020!"

"Congratulations to “Huobi Global” 、“OKEx“、“BiKi”、“Binance” 、 “ProBit Exchange”for wining the “Best Popularity Award” in the category of “Exchanges” at PANews’ Retrospect of the Year Award 2020, a.k.a. PARTY Award 2020!"

"Defi Awards"
"Congratulations to “DODO” 、“Tokenlon” 、“Bifrost Finance” 、 “Kava” 、 “MOV” 、“Linear. Finance” 、“C.R.E.A.M. Finance” 、 “Sifchain” for wining the “Most Promising Defi of the Year Award” in the category of “Defi” at PANews’ Retrospect of the Year Award 2020, a.k.a. PARTY Award 2020!"

"Congratulations to “Loopring” 、“dYdX” 、“NEST Protocol” 、 “Wing” 、“Injective” for wining the “Best Popularity Award” in the category of “Defi” at PANews’ Retrospect of the Year Award 2020, a.k.a. PARTY Award 2020!"

"Congratulations to “SushiSwap” 、“Uniswap” 、“Synthetix” 、“YFII” for wining the “Best Governance Award” in the category of “Defi” at PANews’ Retrospect of the Year Award 2020, a.k.a. PARTY Award 2020!"

"Congratulations to “dForce” 、“Matcha” 、 “Organix” 、 “Aave” 、 “ForTube” for wining the “Best Defi of the Year” in the category of “Defi” at PANews’ Retrospect of the Year Award 2020, a.k.a. PARTY Award 2020!"

"Mining Brands Awards"
"Congratulations to “f2Pool”、“Poolin”、“AntPool”、“Huobi.pool” 、 “Binance.pool” 、“BTC.com” for wining the “Best Mining Pools of the Year (BTC) Award” in the category of “Mining Brands” at PANews’ Retrospect of the Year Award 2020, a.k.a. PARTY Award 2020!"

"Congratulations to “f2Pool” 、 “SparkPool” 、“SpiderPool” 、 “NanoPool” for wining the “Best Mining Pools of the Year (ETH) Award” in the category of “Mining Brands” at PANews’ Retrospect of the Year Award 2020, a.k.a. PARTY Award 2020!"

"Congratulations to “挖易矿池” 、 “思创优” 、“BITMAIN” 、“币信”、“莱比特” 、“比特微”for wining the “Most Influential Mining Companies Award” in the category of “Mining Brands” at PANews’ Retrospect of the Year Award 2020, a.k.a. PARTY Award 2020!"

"Companies"
"Congratulations to “数秦科技、CoinGecko、DappRadar、CoinMarketCap、Chain.info、PeckShield、VeChain、Amber Group、Onchain、域乎科技、欧科云链集团、太壹科技、算力互联 Interhash、成都链安科技有限公司、艾鸥科技、AToken、TokenPocket、499Block、HashKey Hub、CyberVein数脉链、Chainlink、Vidy 、麦子钱包” for wining the “Outstanding Contribution Award” in the category of “Companies” at PANews’ Retrospect of the Year Award 2020, a.k.a. PARTY Award 2020!"

"Investment Institution"
"Congratulations to “NGC Ventures、Alameda Research、Parafi Capital、Coinbase Ventures、Pantera Capital、IOSG Ventures、分布式资本、Polychain Capital、科银资本、Three Arrows Capital、BKEX Capital、Dragonfly Capital Partners、Digital Currency Group、Framework Ventures、共识实验室、SNZ Holding、KR1、HashKey Capital、Arrington XRP Capital” for wining the “Most Powerful Investment Institutions of the Year” in the category of “Investment Institution” at PANews’ Retrospect of the Year Award 2020, a.k.a. PARTY Award 2020!"

"Congratulations to “Bitrise Capital、安策资本、Axia8 Ventures、JDIventure、ChainHill Capital、太和资本、Cabin VC、金氪资本” for wining the “Most Promising Investment Institutions of the Year Award” in the category of “Investment Institution” at PANews’ Retrospect of the Year Award 2020, a.k.a. PARTY Award 2020!"

"Business and Opinion Leaders"
"Congratulations to “曹寅、达鸿飞 、杜均 、Gavin Wood 、何一  、黄天威 、黄凌波 、巨建华 、Jay Hao 、江卓尔 、Jocy Lin  、酒儿 、李俊 、李晨 、李启元、刘飞  、曲俊杰 、孙宇晨 、神鱼 、Sunny Lu 、Vitalik Buterin 、Vanessa Cao 、肖风  、徐坤、许英龙 、于佳宁 、杨民道 、玉竹 、Illia 、赵长鹏 、朱砝 ” for wining the “Business Leaders of the Year” in the category of “Business and Opinion Leaders” at PANews’ Retrospect of the Year Award 2020, a.k.a. PARTY Award 2020!"

"Congratulations to “Camille、烦立婷、蒋琰、卡咩、蓝狐笔记、洛一、路安安、区块萌动_摇十三、史大爷、上野、吴说区块链、王子健、园长、张姨杨姨、真本聪” for wining the “Most Influential KOLs of the Year” in the category of “Business and Opinion Leaders” at PANews’ Retrospect of the Year Award 2020, a.k.a. PARTY Award 2020!"
""
;
}
